sentence: This image is a screenshot of a webpage from "games-to-download.com", featuring downloadable games for various categories.
sentence_cn: 此图片是“games-to-download.com”网页的截图，其中列出了各种类别的可下载游戏。

sentence: ### Page Layout:
sentence_cn: ### 页面布局：

sentence: - Header:
sentence_cn: -标题：

sentence: - The website name "games-to-download.com" is at the top left, with the word "games" in red, "to" in green, and "download" in blue.
sentence_cn: - 网站名称“games-to-download.com”位于左上角，其中“games”为红色，“to”为绿色，“download”为蓝色。

sentence: The ".com" is in light color.
sentence_cn: “.com”是浅色的。

sentence: - Below the title, in yellow text: "Games to Download for All Ages to Have Fun Safely".
sentence_cn: - 标题下方用黄色文字写着：“适合所有年龄段的人下载的游戏，让您安全享受乐趣”。
words: Games to Download for All Ages to Have Fun Safely

sentence: - Main Welcome Section:
sentence_cn: - 主要欢迎部分：

sentence: - A blue background section with the message: "Welcome to Games to Download that you can trust!"
sentence_cn: - 蓝色背景部分带有消息：“欢迎来到您可以信赖的游戏下载！”
words: Welcome to Games to Download that you can trust!

sentence: - Text in white: "Games to Download offers downloadable games for you to play and have fun safely."
sentence_cn: - 白色文字：“游戏下载”提供可下载的游戏，供您安全畅玩。”
words: Games to Download offers downloadable games for you to play and have fun safely.

sentence: - The instructions: "PICK YOUR GAME, DOWNLOAD GAME and HAVE FUN now!" with "PICK YOUR GAME" in yellow, "DOWNLOAD GAME" in orange, and "HAVE FUN" in blue.
sentence_cn: - 说明：“选择您的游戏，下载游戏并立即享受乐趣！”其中“选择您的游戏”为黄色，“下载游戏”为橙色，“享受乐趣”为蓝色。
words: PICK YOUR GAME, DOWNLOAD GAME and HAVE FUN now!

sentence: - Game Categories:
sentence_cn: - 游戏类别：

sentence: - Displayed in a grid, some in gray background squares, some in white:
sentence_cn: - 以网格形式显示，一些为灰色背景方块，一些为白色：

sentence: - Action Games: Represented by a UFO shooting.
sentence_cn: - 动作游戏：以UFO射击为代表。

sentence: - Puzzles Games: Shows colorful spheres possibly indicating a matching game.
sentence_cn: - 拼图游戏：显示彩色球体，可能表示匹配游戏。

sentence: - Arcade Games: Features classic arcade-style pixel characters.
sentence_cn: - 街机游戏：具有经典的街机风格像素角色。

sentence: - Cards Games: Illustrated with playing cards.
sentence_cn: - 纸牌游戏：以扑克牌作为插图。

sentence: - Sports Games: Represented by a flag and football.
sentence_cn: - 体育比赛：以一面旗帜和足球为代表。

sentence: - Simulation Games: Depicted by a rocket and stars.
sentence_cn: - 模拟游戏：以火箭和星星为代表。

sentence: - Kids Games: Illustrated with child-like silhouettes.
sentence_cn: - 儿童游戏：以儿童般的轮廓为插图。

sentence: - Strategy Games: Features chess pieces.
sentence_cn: - 策略游戏：以棋子为特色。

sentence: - Adventure Games: Depicted by a character riding a dragon.
sentence_cn: - 冒险游戏：以骑龙的人物为描绘对象。

sentence: - PSP Games: Displayed with an image of a PSP console.
sentence_cn: - PSP 游戏：以 PSP 控制台的图像显示。

sentence: ### Side Advertisements:
sentence_cn: ### 侧面广告：

sentence: - Top Ad:
sentence_cn: - 顶部广告：

sentence: - Image of a marketplace scene with a covered wagon and people.
sentence_cn: - 带有篷车和人群的市场场景图像。

sentence: Above a red "Play" button.
sentence_cn: 上面有一个红色的“播放”按钮。

sentence: - Bottom Ad:
sentence_cn: - 底部广告：

sentence: - "CLICK KIDS" with letters in colored blocks.
sentence_cn: - “CLICK KIDS” 带有彩色块字母。

sentence: - Text: "Teaching KIDS One Click at a Time" and "Your Child Will Love To Learn".
sentence_cn: - 文字：“一次点击即可教孩子”和“您的孩子会喜欢学习”。
words: Teaching KIDS One Click at a Time
Your Child Will Love To Learn

sentence: - Image of a smiling child holding books, depicting a learning theme.
sentence_cn: - 一个微笑的孩子手里拿着书的图像，描绘了一个学习主题。

sentence: The overall design is colorful and playful, likely catering to a wide audience interested in casual downloadable games.
sentence_cn: 整体设计色彩丰富、充满趣味，很可能会满足对休闲可下载游戏感兴趣的广大受众的需求。
